Text: Pleiospilos is a genus of succulent flowering plants of the Aizoaceae family, native to South Africa.

Text: Pleiospilos:  The name is derived from the Greek "pleios" "many" and "spìlos" "spot".

2:

Text: Pleiospilos:  The plants are also known as kwaggavy ("Quagga mesemb"), lewerplant ("liver plant"), lewervygie ("liver mesemb"), klipplant ("stone plant"), split rock or mimicry plant.
